name: Cosmo (Xhine, maristalmoen, Vildebru97, selmagravir)
description:
A clumsy astronaut lands on an alien planet. His rocket sets the planet ablaze, forcing him to run for his dear life.

Game project for course TPD4168 at NTNU (Autumn 2020). 

Made by: Mari Solem Talmoen, Vilde Bruvik, Mikael Røsbak Hanssen 

& Selma Øfsthus Gravir.

Controls: 

Jump - Up arrow

Slide - Down arrow (Hold)

Flip - Space or F

Go to main menu - ESC

If the game doesn't register input, try clicking on the game window once, then resume play.
